content: UFC on ESPN 51Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-luque-vs-dos-anjos/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Vicente Luque vs. Rafael dos Anjos(must get 12 correct to proceed)11. Cub Swanson vs. Hakeem Dawodu10. Khalil Rountree Jr. vs. Chris Daukaus9. Polyana Viana vs. Iasmin Lucindo8. A.J. Dobson vs. Tafon Nchukwi7. Josh Fremd vs. Jamie Pickett(1 point each)6. JP Buys vs. Marcus McGhee5. Terrence McKinney vs. Mike Breeden4. Francis Marshall vs. Isaac Dulgarian3. Josh Parisian vs. Martin Buday2. Jaqueline Amorim vs. Montserrat Ruiz1. Juliana Miller vs. Luana SantosNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example12. Vicente Luque 11. Cub Swanson 10. Khalil Rountree Jr. 9. Polyana Viana8. A.J. Dobson 7. Josh Fremd 6. JP Buys 5. Terrence McKinney 4. Francis Marshall 3. Josh Parisian 2. Jaqueline Amorim1. Juliana Miller NOT go the Full Distance 4(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.created_time: August 08, 2023, 03:13:16 PMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 04:27:12 PM by jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.If you want to be eligible for my weekly Prediction/Promo threads going forward, you should probably join at least one of these Pools   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461024.msg62600878#msg62600878
